## Project: SolarPal
A web application to help Filipinos find optimal solar panel locations using NASA POWER solar irradiance data.

### Architecture:
- Frontend: Next.js + TailwindCSS
- Backend: FastAPI
- API: NASA POWER solar irradiance data
